endpointAddress.description: Doxim Estatements endpoint address (url). Provided by Doxim.

identifier.description: Doxim Estatements Institution Identifier (e.g., 'connectfss'). This is how their system knows who is making the request.

secretKey.description: Secret key for HMAC-SHA-256 encryption. This is the key used to encrypt the .hmac property on the request object.
